divs: Sighting Detailssitting in my backyard to have a cigarette, looking up and saw what looked like a star or satellite moving from south to north about 15deg. in about 3 secs then it turns east practically at a 90deg. angle in about a second and continues out of my view in about 2 secs. I was impressed by how fast it was moving and how quickly it turuned. I looked for it some more didn't see it. I went back into my apartment and got online to report it.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around October 21st 2007
